Verses.27: Then Peter said to Him, "Look, we have left everything and followed you. What, then, will there be for us?"
Verses.28: And Jesus said to them, "Truly, I say to you that in the renewal of creation, the Son of Man will sit upon His glorious throne. Then you who have followed Me will also sit upon twelve thrones, and judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
Verses.29: Also, everyone who has left their homes, or siblings, or father, or mother, or children, or lands, for the sake of My name, will receive a hundred-fold what they left. And they will inherit eternal life.
Verses.30: But, many who are first will be last, and the last will be first."
